languages.text: "Кхм... Достойно. Даргонус не подкачал". {n}Абеляр усилием воли сгоняет с губ довольную улыбку и шепчет вам:{/n} "Вы же помните, что дальше? Сейчас Вашей Светлости надо будет принести клятву".

"Hmph... Adequate. Dargonus has not disappointed." {n}Abelard forces the smile of satisfaction from his face and whispers to you,{/n} "You remember the next part, yes? Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} will be asked to take the oath."
languages.original_text: "Кхм... Достойно. Даргонус не подкачал". {n}Абеляр усилием воли сгоняет с губ довольную улыбку и шепчет вам:{/n} "Вы же помните, что дальше? Сейчас Вашей Светлости надо будет принести клятву".

traits.locale_text: "Hmph... Adequate. Dargonus has not disappointed." {n}Abelard forces the smile of satisfaction from his face and whispers to you,{/n} "You remember the next part, yes? Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} will be asked to take the oath."

"Hmph... Adequate. Dargonus has not disappointed." {n}Abelard forces the smile of satisfaction from his face and whispers to you,{/n} "You remember the next part, yes? Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} will be asked to take the oath."

"Hmph... Adequate. Dargonus has not disappointed." {n}Abelard forces the smile of satisfaction from his face and whispers to you,{/n} "You remember the next part, yes? Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} will be asked to take the oath."

"Hmph... Adequate. Dargonus has not disappointed." {n}Abelard forces the smile of satisfaction from his face and whispers to you,{/n} "You remember the next part, yes? Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} will be asked to take the oath."

languages.text: 「ふむ…十分だな。ダルゴナスは失望していない」{n}アベラルドは満足げな笑顔を作ってあなたにささやく。{/n}「次は何をするか覚えていらっしゃいますか？陛下が誓いを立てる番になります」
languages.original_text: "Hmph... Adequate. Dargonus has not disappointed." {n}Abelard forces the smile of satisfaction from his face and whispers to you,{/n} "You remember the next part, yes? Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} will be asked to take the oath."

traits.locale_text: 「ふむ…十分だな。ダルゴナスは失望していない」{n}アベラルドは満足げな笑顔を作ってあなたにささやく。{/n}「次は何をするか覚えていらっしゃいますか？陛下が誓いを立てる番になります」

languages.text: “哼……算是及格了，达戈努斯并没有让人失望。”{n}阿贝拉德强忍着一丝满意的笑容，转头向你低语。{/n}“您没有忘记流程吧？接下来轮到您宣誓了，大人。”
languages.original_text: "Hmph... Adequate. Dargonus has not disappointed." {n}Abelard forces the smile of satisfaction from his face and whispers to you,{/n} "You remember the next part, yes? Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} will be asked to take the oath."

traits.locale_text: “哼……算是及格了，达戈努斯并没有让人失望。”{n}阿贝拉德强忍着一丝满意的笑容，转头向你低语。{/n}“您没有忘记流程吧？接下来轮到您宣誓了，大人。”

languages.text: «Mmm... es adecuado. Dargonus no decepciona». {n}Abelard borra la sonrisa satisfecha de su rostro y te susurra:{/n} «Recuerda lo que viene a continuación, ¿verdad? Tendrá que prestar el juramento, mi{mf|lord|lady}».
languages.original_text: "Hmph... Adequate. Dargonus has not disappointed." {n}Abelard forces the smile of satisfaction from his face and whispers to you,{/n} "You remember the next part, yes? Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} will be asked to take the oath."

traits.locale_text: «Mmm... es adecuado. Dargonus no decepciona». {n}Abelard borra la sonrisa satisfecha de su rostro y te susurra:{/n} «Recuerda lo que viene a continuación, ¿verdad? Tendrá que prestar el juramento, mi{mf|lord|lady}».

languages.text: « Hmph... C'est convenable. Dargonus s'est montrée à la hauteur. » {n}Abélard se force à effacer un sourire satisfait avant de se pencher vers vous pour vous murmurer :{/n} « Vous vous rappelez quoi faire ensuite, n'est-ce pas, Votre Seigneurie? Vous allez devoir prêter serment. »
languages.original_text: "Hmph... Adequate. Dargonus has not disappointed." {n}Abelard forces the smile of satisfaction from his face and whispers to you,{/n} "You remember the next part, yes? Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} will be asked to take the oath."

traits.locale_text: « Hmph... C'est convenable. Dargonus s'est montrée à la hauteur. » {n}Abélard se force à effacer un sourire satisfait avant de se pencher vers vous pour vous murmurer :{/n} « Vous vous rappelez quoi faire ensuite, n'est-ce pas, Votre Seigneurie? Vous allez devoir prêter serment. »

languages.text: "Hmpf ... Angemessen. Dargonus hat nicht enttäuscht." {n}Abelard zwingt sich zu einem zufriedenen Lächeln und flüstert dir zu:{/n} "Ihr wisst noch, wie es weitergeht, ja? Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} wird gebeten, den Eid abzulegen."
languages.original_text: "Hmph... Adequate. Dargonus has not disappointed." {n}Abelard forces the smile of satisfaction from his face and whispers to you,{/n} "You remember the next part, yes? Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} will be asked to take the oath."

traits.locale_text: "Hmpf ... Angemessen. Dargonus hat nicht enttäuscht. {n}Abelard zwingt sich zu einem zufriedenen Lächeln und flüstert dir zu:{/n} "Ihr wisst noch, wie es weitergeht, ja? Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} wird gebeten, den Eid abzulegen."

languages.text: "Hıh... Kâfi... Dargonus hayal kırıklığına uğratmadı." {n}Abelard, yüzündeki memnuniyet ifadesini zorla bastırıp fısıldıyor.{/n} "Sırada ne olduğunu hatırlıyorsunuz değil mi? {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nden yemin etmesi istenecek."
languages.original_text: "Hmph... Adequate. Dargonus has not disappointed." {n}Abelard forces the smile of satisfaction from his face and whispers to you,{/n} "You remember the next part, yes? Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} will be asked to take the oath."

traits.locale_text: "Hıh... Kâfi... Dargonus hayal kırıklığına uğratmadı." {n}Abelard, yüzündeki memnuniyet ifadesini zorla bastırıp fısıldıyor.{/n} "Sıradaki bölümü hatırlıyorsunuz değil mi? {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretlerinden yemin etmesi istenecek."
